public static java.lang.String proceedPost(java.lang.String url,
                                           UserTransaction bd,
                                           User user)
Called if message was a POST with parameters (?xxx) Allows to launch custom actions depending on received messages

Parameters:
url - parameters of the POST URL
bd - HTTP connection with the client (browser)
user - User who generated the request
Returns:
String containing updated page content

preProcessGet

public static java.lang.String preProcessGet(HtmlFile page,
                                             User user)
Do preprocessing actions on HTML page content Preprocessing is actions made on request before loading page from disk

Parameters:
page - the HtmlFile page to process
user - User who generated the request
Returns:
content to directly send back to client, or null if processing shall continue
